description: Forecast calling for cold? Time to get after it in the Highlander Jacket. This classic down puffer layers nicely under a waterproof shell to comfortably relieve you on shivering chairlift rides, and its timeless look and vintage feel fits perfectly overtop any cold-weather outfit in your closet. Zip up when the cold gusts kicks in on the midtown train or the gondola to and from the slopes. 700-fill-power down packs tons of heat on and off the mountain and packs down small for easy-stuffing storage when you're on the move.
name: Marmot Highlander Jacket - Mens

specs.key: Zippered hand pockets offer secure, convenient storage for your everyday, on-the-go essentials
specs.value: phone, keys, wallet, credit card & more
